abstract: Highbridge Capital, the hedge fund that is majority-owned by JPMorgan Chase, has laid off 10 percent of its workforce, or 35 employees, a person briefed on the matter said, as the environment for hedge funds remains harsh.
lead_paragraph: Highbridge Capital, the hedge fund that is majority-owned by JPMorgan Chase, has laid off 10 percent of its workforce, or 35 employees, a person briefed on the matter said, as the environment for hedge funds remains harsh.
